t: Shopping at an Amazon Go Store - Amazon Customer Service
s: To enter using your In-Store code: Open your Amazon app, and select the In-Store Code from the bar on the top of the screen. Once your In-Store key loads, hold it over the scanner at the entry gate. At select Amazon Go locations, you'll be able to enter using a credit card or Amazon One.

t: Amazon to scrap its Go Grocery store branding, close Redmond location | The Seattle Times
s: May 19, 2021 - Amazon is ditching the Amazon Go Grocery brand, closing one of its two Go Grocery stores and rechristening the other under its Amazon Fresh label, a move intended to reduce confusion about its multiple grocery brands.
